name: CastleShift
description:
Game Developed for Ludum Dare #35

Goal: Throw rocks at each other.

Player 1 controls: W A S D -> move; SPACE -> grab rock; SHIFT -> shape rock;

Player 2 controls: UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT -> move; NUMPAD1 -> grab rock; NUMPAD2 -> shape rock.

IMPORTANT: Hold a rock and release it while in movement to kick the rock!
